div.p: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v2/0203
CodeDisplay
DLDriver's license number
PPNPassport number
BRNBreed Registry Number
MRMedical record number
MCNMicrochip Number
ENEmployer number
TAXTax ID number
NIIPNational Insurance Payor Identifier (Payor)
PRNProvider number
MDMedical License number
DRDonor Registration Number
Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/identifier-type

valueMarkdown.value: Types are for general categories of identifiers. See [the identifier registry](identifier-registry.html) for a list of common identifier systems

description.value: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.
